title: PA-19-09: Reminder - Modifications to Presidentially appointed, Senate-confirmed Officials’ Ethics Agreements Require Prior Approval from the U.S. Office of Government Ethics
summary: This Program Advisory reminds ethics officials that modifications to Presidentially appointed, Senate-confirmed officials’ (PAS officials) ethics agreements require prior approval from OGE and outlines the steps OGE will take if a PAS official fails to comply timely with his or her ethics agreement.
